metadata.title: CVE-2023-4042 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ghostscript. The fix for CVE-2020-16305 in ghostscriptwas not included in RHSA-2021:1852-06 advisory as it was claimed to be.This issue only affects the ghostscript package as shipped with Red HatEnterprise Linux 8.

criterions.comment: ghostscript: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
